MainCS2: ^Back on Dipterra, I had a brotha, Tacho
^He an' I made do, with whatever we could find.
^We would go from spot to spot, gatherin' as much as we could an' stockpiling.
^Ya, some nights I couldn't eat. Why I'm mad grateful that I'm here now... But, anywho.
^One of tha nights we were out huntin' pretty late. And, well...
^A clan of spiders was out for a hunt. And ah, let's keep it simple and say that they sniffed out Tacho.
^So, I fled on to our hideaway.
^That sounds... Really rough. I'm so sorry...
^Well, I went back a few days later, see.
^Watched 'em from a distance 'til one of tha spiders was alone...
^Ya! Tricked 'em right into a pool of hot oil!
^(I'd say that's considered murder... But I doubt they have a concept of that in Dipterra... It seems like total anarchy.)
^Of course, that's when I took his Personal Portal Device!
^...Do you not go back at night?
^Why not go home though? Like, at all?
^Why would I? I ain't got no one there. It's a death trap, and there's barely any food at all compared to this haven!
^Far as I know, I reach nirvana! I won tha game! Why would I ever go back?

c-0: ^Honestly... It seems like you might be right.
^It seems like you struggled a lot, and you finally made it... I don't blame you for not wanting to ever go back.
^Ay, I knew ya'd get what I mean!
^There ain't no point in me goin' back when I made it here!
^I'd do the same, honestly. Some days, it feels like I just wanna escape from Earth and kick it here instead.
^Ay, you got viscious spiderfolk goin' around and massacring peeps back on Earth too?
^Well, no. But it certainly feels like it...
^Honestly, a lot of times I feel like probably how you felt. Although without the threat of being murdered on a daily basis. I wish I could just run away to a different world...
^It's more complicated than that... I can't just drop everything for myself.
^I have family, friends... I have more strings attached than you do.
^Ay, I see what ya mean... So really, tha Great Void is tha perfect world.
^There ain't no strings attached here. If ya from here, ya free to do whateva ya want!
^(Jeez... I hope I didn't come across as too depressing...)
^(Well, I can't dwell on it now. I got more cleaning to do...)
c-1: ^You mentioned that there's a whole bunch of other flyfolk in Dipterra. They all go through the same troubles you went through, right?
^Well... You defeated a spider, and even got its Portal Device.
^Why not help out the other flyfolk that are struggling because of the spiders? Some might be like how you used to be, on their own scavenging what they can.
^Ay, they all like that. Not a single insectica aside from them Spiders live in comfort.
^Even more to my point! You could... I dunno, make a difference or something. Help those in need, even if it seems like a lot.
^A small difference is still a difference, y'know?
^Ay... Ya make a point... Though I'd be riskin' my life... And I'd hafta make more food... And somehow get it past O'Ryan...
^It's something to think about, I guess.
^Ay, and think about it I will. Thank ya, Gracie.
^(I don't know if Swatts is genuine or not, but I hope he actually thinks of what I said...)
^(For now, I still got some cleaning to do.)
c-2: ^Y'know, you defeated a Spider, and even took its Portal Device...
^So you're the only one that's managed to kill a Spider...
^To the rest of the insectica, you'd probably be seen as a hero, right?
^So... Why not go back and claim that fame? You could rile up the insectica and start a revolution against the spiders!
^Yeah! You said that they're viscious, destructive, and kill indiscriminately. That sounds like a tyrannical, horrifying way to live... Constantly in fear of being killed by the Spiders...
^But you know how to defeat them! You have their Portal Device! You have the upper hand!
^You could rally the people behind you and fight for peace, and overthrow them!
^Ay, mayhaps... I dunno, that seems a bit above my grade, ya?
^Maybe, but like... Think about it. If you could get one by yourself, imagine the damage you could do if you all teamed up and fought together?
^...I think I see what ya mean.
^I dunno though, that's somethin' I gotta think about.
^(I really hope Swatts does the right thing here. The insectica seem to have been suffering for centuries--this could be their chance at freedom.)
^(But for now... I still have some more cleaning to do.)
